title: 【國際戰線11.21】凜冬烈火6週年　烏克蘭人邀香港人參與紀念

replies.msg:
Dear Hongkongers,

Let's celebrate the 6th anniversary of the Winter of Fire together!

We are proposing you to share the solidarity with Ukraine's fight for freedom in Hong Kong, bringing Ukranian flags and symbols of the Revolution on the streets of Hong Kong as a symbol of freedom!

Dignity and Freedom Day is an official holiday that will be celebrated for the 6th time in Ukraine on November 21, 2019

On 21 November 2013, the Revolution of Dignity in Ukraine has been started. And sixth years after the fight for our and your freedom is continuing in Hong Kong.

We are calling all Hongkongers to join the celebration of the victory of the Revolution of Dignity in Ukraine on November 21, 2019.

Let's show that we connect!

Winter on fire is about Hong Kong too!



https://www.facebook.com/ufhkc/photos/a.468815556801405/993881004294855

replies.msg:
睇英文啦手足
人地叫你帶烏克蘭國旗上街咋

【 《Winter on Fire》導演致香港抗爭者的公開信】

「榮耀歸於烏克蘭，榮耀歸於英雄」

Netflix 紀錄片《凜冬烈火：烏克蘭為自由而戰》的導演得知香港反送中運動的情況，主動寫信給香港抗爭者，再次以烏克蘭革命的成果來鼓勵我們團結起來，繼續為自由和民主挺身而出。

以下是信件的英文原文及中文翻譯。
感謝導演 Evgeny Afineevsky 及翻譯者。





https://www.facebook.com/freedomhkgofficial/posts/363286007679890
